test.instr: (:ins (:info (plate X) (:cond (color X white) (sort X remotecontrol))) (:cons_not (:info (at X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X blue) (sort Y table)))) (:cons_notnot (:info (closed X) (:cond (type X container) (sort X washmachine)))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X refrigerator) (type X container))) (:task (putdown X) (:cond (sort X can) (color X black))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (color X yellow) (sort X bottle) (type Y container) (sort Y refrigerator))) (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (color X red) (sort X can) (type Y container) (sort Y closet))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X bottle) (color X green) (sort Y desk))) )
test.nl: The white remotecontrol is on the plate. The blue cup can't on the table. The washmachine must be closed. Go to the refrigerator. Put down the black can. Put the yellow can in the refrigerator. Take the red can out of the closet. Put the green bottle on the desk.
